医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
个性化的健康和生活方式改变可以延缓老年人的记忆丧失研究表明，当参与者保持活跃和社交参与、控制血压和糖尿病时，认知能力会得到改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Personalized-health-and-lifestyle-changes-can-delay-memory-loss-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Personalized-health-and-lifestyle-changes-can-delay-memory-loss-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2ff9d90-247c-4687-a25d-0c678a40d9cc Mon, 27 Nov 2023 13:13:30 -0500 Personalized health and lifestyle changes can delay memory loss in older adults
研究人员朝着开发多发性硬化症的细胞疗法迈出了一步一个国际团队表明，将一种干细胞注射到进行性多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者的大脑中是安全的、耐受性良好的，并且具有持久的效果，似乎可以保护大脑免受进一步损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Researchers-take-step-toward-developing-cell-therapy-treatment-for-MS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Researchers-take-step-toward-developing-cell-therapy-treatment-for-MS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32cf4e11-c8a7-44a5-bf23-eb7b85e6bfe2 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 12:59:55 -0500 Researchers take step toward developing cell therapy treatment for MS
婴儿面部偏好与遗传有关五个月大的婴儿是否主要看脸或汽车或手机等非社交物体，很大程度上取决于基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Infant-face-preference-linked-to-genics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Infant-face-preference-linked-to-genics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=285931e1-0f02-4a47-b90b-ce025997b1cd Mon, 27 Nov 2023 12:40:45 -0500 Infant face preference linked to genetics
心室颤动发展中涉及的新信号机制马德里国家心血管研究中心 (CNIC) 的 Guadalupe Sabio 和 José Jalife 领导的一项研究发现了一种与心室颤动（一种心律失常或心律不齐）的发展有关的新信号机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-signaling-mechanism-implicated-in-the-development-of-心室-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-signaling-mechanism-implicated-in-the-development-of-心室-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4700301a-50e7-4f67-a3e5-cb9a9e98cb3e Mon, 27 Nov 2023 12:26:22 -0500 New signaling mechanism implicated in the development of ventricular fibrillation
研究揭示了血脂、调脂目标和胆石症之间的复杂关系发表在《肠道》杂志上的一项新研究揭示了血清脂质、脂质调节目标和胆石症（一种以胆结石形成为特征的常见疾病）之间的复杂关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/shed-light-on-the-complex-relationship- Between-serum-lipids-lipid-modifying-targets-and-cholelithiasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/shed-light-on-the-complex-relationship- Between-serum-lipids-lipid-modifying-targets-and-cholelithiasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05283fca-4326-4ab4-a667-edd9be030e01 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 11:59:00 -0500 Study sheds light on the complex relationship between serum lipids, lipid-modifying targets, and cholelithiasis
超过一半的低收入未婚夫妇拥有积极的共同养育关系一项新的研究发现，尽管面临许多挑战，但略多于一半的有孩子的未婚低收入夫妇拥有积极的共同养育关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/More-than-half-of-low-venue-unmarried- Couples-have-positive-co-parenting-relationships.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/More-than-half-of-low-venue-unmarried- Couples-have-positive-co-parenting-relationships.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a87164f8-b1ce-4faa-bf48-ca866da65252 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 11:47:06 -0500 More than half of low-income unmarried couples have positive co-parenting relationships
使用护发产品过程中的硅氧烷排放会对健康造成影响​​​​​​护发产品通常含有容易蒸发的成分，因此使用者可能会吸入其中一些化学物质，从而可能对健康造成影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Siloxane-emissions-during-the-use-of-hair-care-products-can-pose-health-repercussions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Siloxane-emissions-during-the-use-of-hair-care-products-can-pose-health-repercussions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48ab448a-6c34-4611-8bc6-5b0fa00c8e6f Mon, 27 Nov 2023 11:37:45 -0500 Siloxane emissions during the use of hair care products can pose health repercussions
种族和识字率影响乳腺密度临床讨论的可能性社会和人口统计资料如何影响医生与患者讨论乳腺密度的准备程度，反之亦然。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Ethnicity-and-literacy-impact-likelihood-of-clinical-discussions-on-breast-densis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Ethnicity-and-literacy-impact-likelihood-of-clinical-discussions-on-breast-densis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7949fd7b-3e47-4721-8234-32bc89311c39 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 10:34:00 -0500 Ethnicity and literacy impact likelihood of clinical discussions on breast density
德桑蒂斯和纽瑟姆互相争斗，医疗保健成为首要和中心共和党总统候选人罗恩·德桑蒂斯 (Ron DeSantis) 和民主党州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom)——来自对立海岸的政治对手，也是红蓝美国的代理人——将于 11 月 30 日在佐治亚州举行首次此类辩论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Health-care-is-front-and-center-as-Desantis-and-Newsom-go-mano-a-mano.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Health-care-is-front-and-center-as-Desantis-and-Newsom-go-mano-a-mano.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67067228-0a55-4b03-a835-bbaf47162c1d Mon, 27 Nov 2023 08:50:12 -0500 Health care is front and center as Desantis and Newsom go mano a mano
Abiomed 宣布首例患者入组具有里程碑意义的 AMI 心源性休克 RECOVER IV 试验强生医疗科技旗下 Abiomed 宣布，世界上第一位患者已参加具有里程碑意义的 RECOVER IV 随机对照试验 (RCT)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Abiomed-announces-enrollment-of-first-病人-in-landmark-RECOVER-IV-trial-for-AMI-cardiogenic-shock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Abiomed-announces-enrollment-of-first- Patient-in-landmark-RECOVER-IV-Trial-for-AMI-cardiogenic-shock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e01a56f-f213-4611-9190-72a051c7a525 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 08:43:40 -0500 Abiomed announces enrollment of first patient in landmark RECOVER IV trial for AMI cardiogenic shock
